P. 816closureto -c r,?,599.CABIN L T.ADMINISTRATION OF SAMOA UNDKR A MANDATE.COPY OF TELEGRAM from the Governor General of New Zealand to the Secretary of State for the Colonies.(Dated 6th March),(Received Colonial Office 5.55 a.m. 6th March, 1920,)Matter most urgent for reason given In my telegram 27th January my Prime Minister has asked me- to represent urgent necessity for- immediate action in the matter of issue of Order in Council conferring on New Zealand'jurisdiction to govern Samoan Islands.: "New Zealand/Parliamentary Party is now at Samoan ;;lslands -and will be leaving, in a day or two.Or 'v OV i\.rvri.,' v; 0 ^LIV&RPOOLv ;mi iCev;
